comment.author: 43067386@N07
comment._content: Sure looks like the Anglican Church on King Street, Christiansted, St Croix, looking northeast. Peak roof on left midway down in now Police Station at Sunday Market Square

comment.author: 48168568@N08
comment._content: This is definitely St John's Anglican Church on King St. in St Croix.  That is where I was baptized and went to school.  I know that street like I know the lines on my face.
